title: Strengthening Customer Service Competencies: STEM Exploration with Popular Culture: Interest-Based Self-Directed Learning

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding Basic Science and Technology Concepts and Smartphone Usage Skills
context.additional_context: Service/Customer Engagement Role-Specific Competency Development Program

learning_goals: Students can identify and explain STEM principles found in popular culture content (films, games, music, etc.)
Learners achieve over 80% task completion rates using interest-based self-regulation strategies
Students can apply computational thinking (problem decomposition, pattern recognition, abstraction) to propose solutions for real-life problems

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
